title: Fix email address not displaying in EnrollmentSection

requirements.summary: Fix email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com visibility in EnrollmentSection component by auditing and resolving conditional rendering, CSS visibility issues, or logic that may be hiding the email callout
acceptanceCriteria: The email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is visible on the enrollment section when the page first loads.
The email address remains visible in both the default form state and after a successful form submission.
The email is rendered as a clickable mailto link or clearly styled text callout.
No CSS properties (display:none, visibility:hidden, opacity:0, etc.) are hiding the email element.
The email callout is visible on both mobile and desktop screen sizes.

file_operations.description: Audit the EnrollmentSection component to identify and fix why the email address athletes@velocityhealthclinic.com is not visible. Review conditional rendering logic around form states (idle, submitting, success) to ensure the email callout is always rendered. Check for any CSS classes that might hide the element (hidden, invisible, opacity-0, sr-only, etc.). Ensure the email is rendered outside any conditional blocks tied to form submission state. Verify the mailto link or text callout has proper visibility styling and is not affected by parent container styles. Test that the email displays correctly on both mobile and desktop breakpoints.
